Title: Start - Daily Todo App
Description: Start is a simple web application for organizing your everyday's tasks. Start was built with NextJS for the Front-end, Go for the back-end and SQLite as its database.

Title: Simple Data Visualization Web App
Description: As part of the 'Software Technology' course at Ionian University, my project's classmates and I developed this simple data visualization web app. This web app was made in Python using Streamlit and Pandas.

Title: Simple Search Engine
Description: As part of the 'Information Retrieval' course at Ionian University, my classmate and I developed this simple search engine web app. This web app was made in Python using Streamlit.
